CustomField.description: Default value for new contacts is true. When set to true the system will auto update the contact's personal greeting, personal recognition name, and formal greeting with the system default format. Personal = FirstName, Personal Recognition Name = Salutation FirstName LastName, Formal Greeting = Personal Recognition Name
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default value for new contacts is true. When set to true the system will auto update the contact's personal greeting, personal recognition name, and formal greeting with the system default formats.
CustomField.label: Auto Calculate Contact Greetings
